EmailTemplate.name: GDPR Unsubscribe Request - response
EmailTemplate.subject: Unsubscribe Request Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Unsubscribe Request Confirmed Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for your email. We acknowledge your request to opt out of further communications. I confirm that we have updated our systems so that you will receive no further unsolicited contact from Supply Desk.
Kind regards
Data Processing Lead - Supplydesk
